org.nd4j.linalg.convolution

Interface ConvolutionInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseConvolution, DefaultConvolutionInstance

    public interface ConvolutionInstance
    Convolution instance. Implementations of convolution algorithms

               INDArray kernel,
               Convolution.Type type,

        ND Convolution
        Parameters:
